experience.title: Director
experience.description: • Spearheaded R&D initiatives and manufacturing of portable OxyHydrogen generators aimed at energy efficiency, green fuel, energy storage application.• Developed "AquaWelder" Hydrogen fueled solution for Metal Brazing, Material drying and industrial heating .• Developed and executed a lean manufacturing strategy, outsourcing production to local providers, optimizing for the lowest production costs and fastest time to market, resulting in the launch of four new hydrogen fuel products within 18 months.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: -  Founded and led a technology-driven company for over 21 years, demonstrating long-term vision and adaptability in a rapidly evolving industry.-  Conceptualized and launched an online marketplace for the Indian PCB/ Electronic manufacturing industry, facilitating global B2B connections and driving market growth.-  Developed and executed strategies that connected over 100 Indian companies with the global electronics industry, significantly expanding market reach.-  Built and managed high-performing remote teams across product engineering, design, development, prototyping and outsourced manufacturing functions.-  Provided vision, strategy, and operational management for business development solutions and consulting.

volunteer_experience.info:
JanShakti Foundation is a charity registered in Vadodara, Gujarat. Janshakti means Power of People and as the name suggests, we motivate and organise the people to build a happy and healthy society. Education, self-employment, women empowerment and environment are our prime concerns.• Conceptualized a social enterprise to integrate over 18,000 villages. The project is aimed at empowering rural population by delivering information on education and training opportunities, employment…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          JanShakti Foundation is a charity registered in Vadodara, Gujarat. Janshakti means Power of People and as the name suggests, we motivate and organise the people to build a happy and healthy society. Education, self-employment, women empowerment and environment are our prime concerns.• Conceptualized a social enterprise to integrate over 18,000 villages. The project is aimed at empowering rural population by delivering information on education and training opportunities, employment, health services, insurance, banking, government's civic services, buyers' for farmers' produce and many more. The project shall bridge the last mile gap between corporate products and services and rural communities while creating employment and entrepreneurship opportunities for over 50,000 youth.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: JanShakti Foundation
volunteer_experience.title: Founder President

volunteer_experience.info:
G R Bhagat High School at village Bhadarwa, 20 Kms from Vadodara is school for rural children. Education is imparted in Gujarati language for the class from Nursery to 12th. Designed plan to improve the quality of education through better participation of all the three stake holders - students, teachers and parents. In the face of rapidly changing government policies and increasing competition from professionally managed private schools, meeting the expectations of the students and…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          G R Bhagat High School at village Bhadarwa, 20 Kms from Vadodara is school for rural children. Education is imparted in Gujarati language for the class from Nursery to 12th. Designed plan to improve the quality of education through better participation of all the three stake holders - students, teachers and parents. In the face of rapidly changing government policies and increasing competition from professionally managed private schools, meeting the expectations of the students and parents is becoming extremely difficult. Scarce resources and lack of interest of families at the bottom of the pyramid is the real challenge to motivate average students to pursue higher studies. To address the challenges and employ all the three stake holders to work for a solution, several measures are being taken.  Student Council - develop student leadership to identify problems and aware and encourage them find solution in a collaborative manner.Parent - Teacher- Student meetingsHealth Check-upPsychometric Testing/ Aptitude Testing
            

    
    

    
        Show less
volunteer_experience.subtitle: G R Bhagat High School
volunteer_experience.title: Managing Board

          Politics is a very effective medium to serve the society. Aam Aadmi Party born out of India Against Corruption movement across the country, was a natural choice for me to join after years of working on social issues mainly in rural areas.• Joined Aam Aadmi Party in February 2013 as volunteer and served as District Committee member. • Worked as a convener of a state assembly constituency since 2015.• Lead several campaigns for Public Awareness on Right-to-Information, Right-to-Education, Welfare Schemes for the Socially and Economically backward people, Value-based Politics.• Served as Campaign Manager for a state assembly during Gujarat State elections in Dec. 2017.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

projects: [{"title":"AquaWelder - Hydrogen as a fuel for Metal welding/ Brazing. Replaces fossil fuels.","start_date":"May 2021","description":"Welding / Brazing of Copper wires is an important process in electrical manufacturing industry. Copper with Copper or with some other metal is joined / fused for making an electrical connection.Conventionally fossil fuels like Acetylene or LPG with Oxygen are used as fuel. Mixture of Hydrogen + Oxygen generated from water using electrolysis, has proven to be superior fuel than fossil fuels. The supply chain and storage challenges are completely eliminated as the Hydroxy fuel is generated on-demand.Under AquaWelder project we undertake design, development , prototyping and manufacturing of machines for joining variety of metals like copper, mild steel, Brass,, stainless steel using brazing process. Our prototypes are successfully working at Thermocouple manufacturing and Electrical Motor manufacturing industry. #AquaWelder has totally replaced #fossil fuel and #carbon emissions is zero making the working environment cleaner and safer."},{"title":"HyPulJet - The integrated Hydrogen Power unit.","start_date":"Feb 2021","description":"HyPulJet is startup company based in Derby, UK.We plan to develop an innovative engine that use Hydrogen as fuel and act as a generator for electric vehicles. It will be a low cost Green alternative to fuelcells and batteries with Zero CO2 and zero NOx."},{"title":"Hydrogen for Waste2Energy","start_date":"May 2020","description":"#Hydrogen aids #Waste2Energy process..Hydroxy #FuelCell System developed by #HyEnergy was recently supplied to #Germany for a #Waste2Energy project to help reduce emissions from an incinerator. In the next phase, we shall take up aiding Pyrolysis and gassification process with the aim to reduce and if possible replace #fossil fuel consumption and #carbon emissions."},{"title":"NG + OxyHydrogen fueled Power Generator","start_date":"Oct 2019","description":"Designed and Developed OxyHydrogen Genrator for NG fueled Power Generator to increase fuel efficiency and reduce emissions, for a German buyer. We supplied two prototypes for testing."},{"title":"HyStove","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Present","description":"HyStove is an ambitious project to develop a cooking stove aiming to replace use of wood and coal by Hydrogen."},{},{"title":"Water Fuel Cell","start_date":"Nov 2007","end_date":"Present","description":"Water Fuel cell project was conceived from the need to contain the vehicular pollution. Hydrogen from water can be used to reduce emissions from an IC Engine to great extent,We have built numerous models and prototypes of the electrolyser cells of different technology and supplied to independent researchers and companies around the world."},{"title":"Portable Hydroxy Generator","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Feb 2019","description":"Hydroxy Fuel is finding application in several of industry applications to reduce or replace use of fossil fuel. We started this project to build a Hydroxy fuel generator which is portable, efficient and competitive on price. This objective was achieved with our experience and expertise in Hydrogen domain. The design and the process is being reviewed for securing IP rights."},{"title":"Ni Foam as Electrodes based Electrolyser","start_date":"Nov 2016","end_date":"May 2017","description":"We designed and developed a electrolyser using Ni foam electrodes which are 5 times more efficinet for Hydrogen generation, for research a project of Engineering Department of a Gulf Univeristy."},{"title":"PCBindia.com","start_date":"Mar 2002","end_date":"Jun 2010","description":"India's first eMarketPlace for Printed Circuit Boards industry was developed to help Indian manufacturers buy and sell globally."}]
